tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FraudMonitoring (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   activity_time TIMESTAMP,
   activity_description TEXT,
   user_id INT,
   is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_reporting (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(50),
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    fraud_activity_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (fraud_activity_id) REFERENCES fraudulent_activities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_activity_id FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES fraudulent_activities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR(255),
    user_id INT,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    reported_by VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE activity_details (
    detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id INT,
    detail_description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(255),
    report_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE report_details (
    detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    detail_description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(255),
    report_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE FraudulentActivities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    reported_by UUID
)

CREATE TABLE SuspectUsers (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT,
    registration_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ReportedActivities (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id UUID,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    reporter_id UUID,
    report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE InvestigationLogs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id UUID,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    investigator_id UUID,
    log_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FraudulentPatterns (
    pattern_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_description TEXT,
    pattern_description TEXT,
    detection_date TIMESTAMP,
    confirmed_fraud BOOLEAN
)
